about_the_game: Contains 28 drum and bass tunes from the heart-pounding, gravity defining combat racer GRIP. Featuring tracks from Full Kontakt, Whiney, S.P.Y, Royalston and more.
detailed_description:
WISHLIST MEOW! 😻


About the Game

Contains 28 drum and bass tunes from the heart-pounding, gravity defining combat racer GRIP. Featuring tracks from Full Kontakt, Whiney, S.P.Y, Royalston and more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 or Radeon 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970 or Radeon 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is recommended.
